description:
A color selection element, with custom color palettes.
`import { Colors } from 'grommet-controls';`
``

colors.description: Color palette for the user to choose a color from
colors.name: colors

onSelect.description: Called with an object containing the selected color, rowName and colorName
onSelect.name: onSelect

type.name: (props: { color: string; rowName: string; colorName: string; }) => void

columns.description: The maximum number of colors per row, if left emty will be calculated automatically
columns.name: columns

wrap.description:
If true, will wrap any rows of colors that exceed the columns limit,
otherwise will truncate larger rows
wrap.name: wrap
